body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, Lovaky 2.4G Full-Sized Ergonomic Keyboard Mouse, 3 DPI Adjustable Cordless USB Keyboard and Mouse, Quiet Click for Computer/Laptop/Windows/Mac (1 Pack, Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 55 mins
features: 2.4G Wireless Plug and Play-- Simply connect wireless keyboard and mouse with a USB receiver (INCLUDED in mouse’s battery compartment), for saving USB port of your computer. No delays or dropouts. Allows reliable wireless connection up to 10 meters(33 ft) without any driver.

104-Keys Full-size Keyboard-- With Standard US QWERTY layout, Lovaky wireless keyboard makes each key on the number pad independent and well-spaced, greatly avoiding pressing the wrong key. The foldable stand behind the keyboard provides a comfortable typing angle for you, so you can enjoy comfortable typing for hours.

Power Saving Extends Battery Life-- Keyboard and mouse wireless have power switch to turn on/off, saving unnecessary battery loss. After 10 minutes of inactivity, the wireless keyboard mouse combo will automatically go into sleep mode to save energy. The keyboard requires one AAA battery, and the mouse requires two.

Silent Wireless Mouse-- Computer mouse provides whisper silent click, no need to worry about disturbing others to rest while working or playing. DPI adjustable mouse provides 3 levels of DPI (800/1200/1600) to meet your different needs in terms of sensitivity.

Compatible wireless mouse and keyboard combo-- Includes a full-size keyboard and a high-sensitivity mouse. Works with your PC, Desktop, Laptop or Notebook. Compatible with Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 /10 operating systems.

Power indicator-- the new battery into the keyboard and mouse, if the normal connection with the computer power red light will flash 5-8 seconds off, if the computer is not normally connected to the power red light on for a moment on off. Low battery mode is to press any key power red light will flash. So when you first start using, the power red light keeps flashing for 5-8 seconds is normal.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 104 Full-size Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo Comfortable Typing Experience-- computer keyboard The bottom of the keyboard is equipped with foldable feet, allowing you to adjust the most comfortable typing angle.With the soft key stroke, the keyboard offers smoother touch. Besides, you will feel the keyboard more responsive that’s easy on your fingers and has no input errors. Slim & Portable Design-- wireless optical mouse Wireless mouse adopts slim and symmetrical design, suitable for right or left hand. Moreover, the thinness makes the mouse easier for picking and moving, especially for kids.If you often need to travel or work away from home, Lovaky portable mouse is a good choice for you. Easily fits into a backpack and take around. Mouse Size: 2.44*4.53*1.26in (6.2*11.5*3.3cm)

3 ADJUSTABLE DPI(800/1200/1600) 3-level adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600) of laptop mouse, allows you to choose your favorite moving speed of cursor. Works well with desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer and more. 2 in 1 USB RECEIVER A USB receiver can connect the keyboard and mouse wireless at the same time without taking up more USB ports. USB Receiver is beside battery slot of the mouse. Tips: The wireless keyboard and mouse can also be used separately. LONG BATTERY LIFE The wireless keyboard is powered by 1 AAA battery, while computer mouse is powered by 2 AAA batteries. The mouse will enter into sleep mode after 10min of disuse. Please note that turn off power switch when NOT use for a long time.

Product Description: Design for Longer Battery Lifetime 1. If there is no operation with the keyboard and mouse more than 10 minutes, they will turn to sleep mode automatically. Press any key to activate them. 2. Both the mouse and keyboard have independent switch to turn on/off if you will not use them for a while. 3. The LED indicator light on the keyboard will flash to remind you when to change the low battery. Specification Keyboard Dimension: 17.14*5.55*0.88in (43.5*14.1*2.2cm) Mouse Size: 2.44*4.53*1.26in (6.2*11.5*3.3cm) Mouse DPI: 800, 1200, 1600 Battery: 1*AAA for Keyboard, 2*AAA for Mouse Package Contents 1×Keyboard 1×Mouse 1×USB Receiver (in the mouse battery compartment) 1×User Manual Tips: Solution to Connection Exception Keyboard 1. Take out the battery and USB receiver, reload the battery and plug the receiver into the computer. 2. Turn on the keyboard switch, which should be within 20cm away from the receiver. 3. Press and hold the keyboard “ESC” + “K” keys together to pair again. Mouse 1. Take out the battery and USB receiver, reload the battery and plug the receiver into the computer. 2. Turn on the mouse switch, which should be within 20cm away from the receiver. 3. Press and hold the Right button and Scroll button together to pair again. Power indicator-- the new battery into the keyboard and mouse, if the normal connection with the computer power red light will flash 5-8 seconds off, if the computer is not normally connected to the power red light on for a while on off. Low battery mode is to press any key power red light will flash. So when you first start using, the power red light keeps flashing for 5-8 seconds is normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite keyboard! Best performance at any price. Economical. Unfairly criticized!
reviews.reviewText: First things first. Some people complained about the mouse turning itself off. REALLY? Just tap the button on top of it and it starts back up. This feature saves battery! Are these critics really competitors?I'm a connoisseur of keyboards and mouses though not by choice. I've spilled coffee on and ruined four keyboards. I've replaced each with a different model, trying to find something better. And of course I've used countless other keyboards and mouses at work, on my kids' and friends' computers, etc.From the moment they came out of the box, the keyboard and mouse look and feel better-made than others. They're slightly heavier and stiffer than others. When you shake them they rattle noticeably less than others. The keys are symmetric with each other. The gap around the keys is narrower than on other keyboards. The mouse has no gap between the right and left click buttons, making its construction stiffer.The keyboard is flatter than most but not too flat, which makes it comfortable for my wrists. The keyboard is compact, a smidge narrower and shorter than others on the horizontal plane, which combined with its flatness makes it more transportable. The keys are a bit flatter than normal external keyboards, which makes for quicker action. The keys are also not as flat as those on laptops which I've never gotten used to. The keyboard 'action' - the resistance and bounce-back - are just right, smooth and not too stiff or loose. The keyboard has Caps, Num Lock, and Power indicator lights - not all of them do. Best of all, this is the quietest keyboard I've owned. I'm hard on keyboards but this one feels like it's gonna last forever.The mouse is a bit shorter than others, which makes it comfortable to my hand. The top of the mouse has a slight matte finish instead of glossy, which feels nice to the touch and enables accurate clicking. The mouse has nice click and bounce-back and feels durable. The mouse wheel has a nice grip and looks elegant.In summary, the make, action, size, and energy features make this my favorite-ever keyboard. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel combo
reviews.reviewText: After my old keyboard and mouse died, I needed a replacement to take on business trips. I settled on this keyboard because I prefer a full size keyboard with the number pad attached and this was the best deal I could find. This keyboard mouse combo is on its 3rd trip to Europe and still works great and is on the first set of batteries still for the both of them. Sleep mode works and the mouse and keyboard are very reactive to your motions or key strokes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does everything I need it to do for a cheap price
reviews.reviewText: For keyboards and mice, Logitech is usually my go-to company - I've used their products for years and have always been impressed with the quality. That said, their prices have gone up dramatically lately and I can't justify spending $60 to $80 on a keyboard and mouse anymore. So when my five year old MK570 Logitech keyboard finally started to die, I decided to check out some other options and after looking at the reviews, settled on this one.Overall I'm happy with this combo. considering the $25 price tag it feels surprisingly solid. The keyboard works well, no sticky keys or any problems there. Despite what some reviews say, there is indeed a light that lets you know when the Caps Lock is enabled. It feels a little small, but coming from the larger Logitech keyboards I was expecting to have to adjust. I like the power saving mode, saves me the trouble of switching the devices on and off myself - after 10 minutes of inactivity the mouse goes to sleep and a simple click restores it. The mouse feels comfortable and fits into my palm nicely.For the negatives, well I guess 'whisper click' means something different to the manufacturers because this mouse is by no means quiet click. It's not the loudest I've heard but its definitely noticeable. Not a big deal to me, but if you're looking at this set for quiet operation I think you'll be disappointed. The only other issue I encountered was that I found the receiver incredibly stiff and annoyingly difficult to insert into the USB port, to the point where I actually thought I had it upside down. Normally it takes very little pressure to insert these but for this one I had to push it hard to the point I was concerned something would break. Not sure if this is the case for everyone or if I just got a weird one, but be aware especially if you're constantly using your USB ports like I do.About 2 weeks of heavy use so far and I would recommend this to anyone looking for a economical keyboard/mouse who doesn't need all the bells and whistles. I will update this review if I see any decline in quality over the coming months, but so far so good!

reviews.reviewTitle: es lo mejor y es un excelente vendedor
reviews.reviewText: muy buen vendedor, excelente producto es lo mejor recomendable

I am impressed with the quality of this mouse & keyboard. Very well made, looks and feels like they should last a long time. Easy plug and play, no problem. The mouse has a standby mode that saves battery life, a left click wakes it up. The default curser speed is perfect for me, so no need for me to change that. I would definitely recommend this combo, great value at this price.
Works as they should and very nice

reviews.reviewTitle: Best keyboard and mouse package ever
reviews.reviewText: Mouse and keyboard work amazing and very cheap price

For the price, this combo is okay. I do find that the mouse goes into power saving mode if it’s not in use for a while but as soon as you click on the mouse or keyboard, it wakes back up. I do appreciate the power saving mode. I updated my review from 5 stars down to 3 because only after a few months of use, all of the letters on the keyboard have disappeared including the letters that are not frequently used. It was not meant to withstand daily use. The price is great but if you work from home and need the mouse and keyboard on a daily basis, I’d recommend spending more and buying something that will last more than a few months
